notes_display: Stephen Collins| Jacob Shoemaker| Joshua Howell.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: TEN SHILLINGS.| This Indented Bill of Ten Shillings, shall entitle the Bearer to receive of the Provincial Treasurer, the like Sum of Ten Shillings, of equal Value with the same Sum, of the Bills of Credit now by Law Current, according to
issue_obverse_legend_s: the Directions of an Act of General Assembly of Pensylvania, made in the 11th Year of the Reign of His Majesty Geo. III. Dated March 20, 1771.
issue_reverse_legend_s: TEN SHILLINGS. | To Counterfeit, is DEATH.  Printed by DAVID HALL, and WILLIAM SELLERS. 1771.
